name: Toys And Games 7 Quiz | Hobbies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what card game do marriages occur frequently?
What is the highest a player can score with a single ball in Skee Ball?
questions.explanation:
100.

	The most common skee ball game is made with a 50-point plateau, but there is also 100-point games.

questions.text: Which Parker Brothers game features upright dollar signs as playing pieces?
A player left holding an odd queen is the loser in which game?
Name the game show host who was the youngest catcher ever to play in a world series.
How many wickets are there in a croquet set?
In a game of Hearts what card counts 13?
In Tic-Tac-Toe how many possible winning combinations are there?
Which of the following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Skippers.

	The other 3 are types of marbles.

questions.text: What is the point value of the outer bulls eye on a dartboard?
questions.explanation:
25.

	The inner bulls eye is 50 points.
